title: Zoom Zoom
abstract: Will COVID-19 change the way we work permanently?

body.content:
The lockdowns associated with the COVID-19 pandemic have meant that for many of us we have been working from home for the greater part of 2020. 

Typically if your job involves using a computer, chances are you (and most of your family) have been working remotely. Whilst this may be great for the family pets that appreciate the increased attention, it has put a strain on many households.

Some studious bean-counters have even suggested that this new working relationship can significantly reduce costs to the organization, as when everyone works from home there is less of a demand for real estate and other expenses related to hosting a workforce.
